cardBody: We handle bulk orders for corporate events, employee gifting and client giveaways. Get a custom quote with bulk pricing and delivery timelines.

points.text: HR onboarding kits, festival gifts & event takeaways
Bulk pricing and consistent branding across items

sideBody: Same quality as our retail orders, with dedicated coordination for quantities, artwork and delivery windows. Ideal for Diwali, New Year, onboarding and client appreciation.
